revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Intel |model=SS4000 |revision=-E |asin= |est_release_date=06/2006 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Lanner |manuf_model=EM-7210 |manuf_rev=v0.2B (T04) |type=NAS |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=AC |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=80219;PR80219M400; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F256J3D75 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622ETP-D43 |ram1_num=8 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0, SATA |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=4 |serial=yes |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8110 |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8110 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=4-port PCI-X to Serial ATA Controller;Intel;IQ31244;;1; |flags=fan, RTC w/ battery backup, |stock_boot=RedBoot |stock_os=Linux;;2.6; |tp_firmware=Debian |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth= }} :[http://www.intel.com/design/servers/storage/ss4000-E/index.htm Product page] {{â€¢}} [https://www.cnet.com/products/intel-entry-storage-system-ss4000-e-nas-server-series/specs/ Specification] *[[Intel Entry Storage System SS4000-E]] - 4-bay 3.5" HDD NAS :CPU: [[Intel XScale]] 80219 @400MHz ([https://www.ixbt.com/storage/intel-ss4000/is-board.jpg main board]) RAM is via DDR DIMM socket which can be upgraded to a 512MB DIMM. {{see also|Thecus NAS N2100}} Lanner EM7210 board - SS4000E (Baxter Creek) NAS appliance 
MACHINE_START(EM7210, "Lanner EM7210")
	.phys_io	= IQ31244_UART,
	.io_pg_offst	= ((IQ31244_UART) >> 18) & 0xfffc,
	.boot_params	= 0xa0000100,
	.map_io		= em7210_map_io,
	.init_irq	= iop32x_init_irq,
	.timer		= &em7210_timer,
	.init_machine	= em7210_init_machine,
MACHINE_END
